skills.name: Branding Iron
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 1 turn.

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.
